actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill for the relief of J&V Restaurant Supply and Refrigeration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified amount to a certain restaurant supply and refrigeration company in Bozeman, Montana, for costs arising out of an error in the cost estimates made by the Federal Government with respect to a National Park Service contract for renovation of the kitchen of Mammoth Restaurant in Yellowstone National Park.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of J&V Restaurant Supply and Refrigeration, and for other purposes.
